english: Soft drugs . like soft drinks , only more lucrative
chinese: 软毒品就像软饮料，来一点是无害的

english: Only soft drugs . - i think i can help
chinese: 我只做软毒品-我或许可以帮上忙

english: The amsterdam council wants to release the soft drug trade
chinese: 阿姆斯特丹的政府想让软毒品贸易合法化

english: Violence only when it ' s strictly necessary . and only soft drugs
chinese: 不在万不得已的时候千万不要使用暴力只做软毒品（毒性不大,不易成? ）
软毒品造句挺难的，這是一个万能造句的方法
